WaveTable Editing Tutorial

This section describes how you can create a wavetable from a raw WAV or AIFF sample file. You can then collect one or more WaveTables into a WaveSet and use it in an Instrument.

The WaveTable creation steps are usually performed in the sequence shown below.

  1. Browsing the Wave Repository
  2. Chopping Off the Beginning of a WaveTable
  3. Editing a WaveTable
  4. Measuring Pitch
  5. Renaming Files and WaveTables
  6. Changing Sample Rate
  7. Setting a Loop
  8. Trimming Long Tails
  9. Creating a WaveSet
